regimentPatterns.name: CB Clan with Brackets
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts CB clan when followed by brackets/braces (e.g., CB[30thOH], CB{30thOH}, CB [30thOH])

regimentPatterns.name: Brackets with Spaces in Regiment (Case Insensitive)
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from brackets with optional spaces (e.g., [65th IL], [7TH AR]) - case insensitive

regimentPatterns.name: Braces with Spaces in Regiment (Case Insensitive)
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from braces with optional spaces (e.g., {65th IL}, {6thAR WA}) - case insensitive

regimentPatterns.name: Parentheses with Spaces in Regiment (Case Insensitive)
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from parentheses with optional spaces (e.g., (7TH AR)) - case insensitive

regimentPatterns.name: Brackets with Dash in Regiment (Case Insensitive)
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from brackets with dash (e.g., [65th-IL]) - case insensitive

regimentPatterns.name: Clan at Start Before Rank
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts clan tag at start followed by dash or space (e.g., II-Brig.Gen, II 6th)

regimentPatterns.name: Bracket Missing Close with Company
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from bracket missing close bracket (e.g., [59th(A))

regimentPatterns.name: Prefix Before Any Wrapper
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts prefix before any wrapper (brackets, braces, parens) with optional spaces, case-insensitive

regimentPatterns.name: Mismatched Wrapper at Start
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from mismatched wrappers at start (e.g., [51STAL}, [59th(A))

regimentPatterns.name: Bracket with Space and Company
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from bracket with space and company (e.g., [59th NY (A))

regimentPatterns.name: Ordinal with Abbreviated State
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from ordinal with abbreviated state (e.g., 5th Fl.)

regimentPatterns.name: Dash Space Pattern
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts prefix before dash with spaces (e.g., PA - Ninja)

regimentPatterns.name: Regiment Before Company Bracket
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment before company letter in brackets (e.g., 5thFLA[A])

regimentPatterns.name: Brackets at Start with Company
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from brackets with company suffix (e.g., [12thVA.A], [12thVA.BB])

regimentPatterns.name: Clan-Regiment-Company Pattern
regimentPatterns.description: Matches II-6thLA(A) format - extracts full regiment with company

regimentPatterns.name: Clan-Regiment Pattern
regimentPatterns.description: Matches II-6thLA, TKO-3RDKY format

regimentPatterns.name: Parentheses Regiment
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from parentheses like (12th VA), (1stMO)

regimentPatterns.name: Parentheses Company Only
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment before company marker like 6thLA(A), 59thNY(A)

regimentPatterns.name: Square Brackets with Company Suffix
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from brackets, stripping company suffixes like .CAV, .Cav, (LB), {A}

regimentPatterns.name: Square Brackets (Generic)
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts leftmost [] token

regimentPatterns.name: Curly Braces (Generic)
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts leftmost {} token

regimentPatterns.name: Pipe Delimiter
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts clan before pipe (e.g., SR|3AR)

regimentPatterns.name: Underscore Delimiter
regimentPatterns.description: Extracts regiment from underscore format (e.g., CB_8ThOhio)

regimentPatterns.name: Clan Prefix with Dash
regimentPatterns.description: Handles spaced dash format like 'II - 6thLA'

regimentPatterns.name: Clan with Brackets
regimentPatterns.description: Clan prefix with bracket combo (e.g., JD-[38th Va])

regimentPatterns.name: Clan with Braces
regimentPatterns.description: Clan prefix with brace combo

regimentPatterns.name: Unit at Start
regimentPatterns.description: Unit token at start with optional space (e.g., 5thFla, 5thFLA, 59th NY)

regimentPatterns.name: Prefix Acronyms
regimentPatterns.description: Common regiment prefixes like CQB, MSG, AVC, FSB

normalizationRules.removeSpaces: Remove all spaces from extracted regiment name
normalizationRules.removeDash: Remove dashes and normalize to single word
